title: Trucking along
creator_credit: Justin Milne, Malcolm Smith, South Australian Film Corporation and Newfilms
brief_description: The problems and rewards of school teaching in country areas. Contains interviews with staff, school students and community involved with Ceduna High School in South Australia.
